DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) UNN and EDALV accept NCE credit in Christian Religious 
Studies into 300 level.  
(iii) EDZAR offers admission by Direct Entry only.  
(iv) EDZAR requires five (5)'O' level credit passes in  
relevant subjects which should include Christian 
Religious Studies, English Language and 'O' level pass in 
Mathematics. Also accepts NCE in Christian Religious 
Studies, combined with any other subject with 'C' grade 
including Education.  
(v) TASUED accepts two (2) 'A' level passes/NCE merit to 
include Christian Religious Studies and one (1) other 
subject in Arts/ Social Sciences.  
(vi) ABU accepts   
 (a)  two (2) ‘A’ level passes/NCE merit in Christian Religious 
Studiesand Education.  
(vii) CALABAR accepts NCE merit or credit in Christian 
Religious Studies.  
(viii) OAU requires two (2) ‘A’ level passes or NCE credit merit 
in Christian Religious Studies and one (1) other Arts or 
professional subject.  
(ix) EBSU accepts NCE/Two (2) 'A' level passes in Christian 
Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.  
(x) NDU – Same as Vocational and Technical Education.  
(xi) LAGOS accepts  
(a) Very good passes in three (3) JUPEB subjects: 
Christian Religious Studies and any two (2) of 
Government, History, Geography, Economics,  
Literature in English, Yoruba, Igbo and French.  
(b) Two (2) A’ level passes in Christian Religious Studies 
and any other Arts subject.  
(c) NCE: Christian Religious Studies and any Arts subject.  
(d) Candidate must satisfy the UTME requirement.  
(xii) UNILORIN accepts ND in Religious Studies or Theology of 
London or an accredited Nigerian University.
